1.content: Set up project structure with React-Vite frontend and Python backend for Vercel deployment
1.details: Create the basic project structure optimized for Vercel deployment, including React-Vite app setup and Python API endpoints. Include Docker configuration files for future deployment options.

2.content: Implement Python API service with spaCy LLM integration
2.details: Set up Python FastAPI backend with spaCy-llm library integration for thought parsing and sentence splitting. Include configurable LLM API integration (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) with environment variable support.

3.content: Build React frontend with test buttons and input/output interface
3.details: Create React-Vite app with: test buttons (Small/Medium/Large) for sample rambles, large text input area, process button, and right panel for chunked output visualization. Include API integration to communicate with Python backend.

4.content: Create sample thought rambles for test buttons
4.details: Generate realistic human rambling text samples of varying lengths (small, medium, large) that simulate STT walkie-talkie style communication with multiple disparate thoughts.
